sim.long-description: The Lockheed Martin F-22A "Raptor" is a fifth-generation tactical fighter manufactured by Lockheed Martin and Boeing. It combines supersonic cruise, low-observability, and sensor fusion. The definitive production Block 30/35 model features the AN/APG-77v1 AESA radar and F119-PW-100 engines. The F-22A, the only production F-22 variant, became operational in 2005 and is operated exclusively by the United States Air Force.
sim.author: ncc_42, Fabrizio Fracaroli, StuartC and Petar Jedvaj

help.title: F-22A Raptor
help.line: Which means it can go faster than mach 1
